abstract: Facebook chairman Mark Zuckerberg addresses government and business leaders at United Nations Private Sector Forum luncheon announcing he will help bring Internet connections to refugee camps; endeavor, Internet.org, strives to expand online connectability everywhere through phone carrier partnerships and technological innovations.
lead_paragraph: The connectivity ambitions are at the center of Mr. Zuckerberg’s advocacy effort, Internet.org, whose principal goal is to offer Internet access to about four billion people who cannot afford it.

headline.main: Mark Zuckerberg Announces Project to Connect Refugee Camps to the Internet
headline.print_headline: Facebook Will Help Connect Refugee Camps to Internet

snippet: The connectivity ambitions are at the center of Mr. Zuckerberg’s advocacy effort, Internet.org, whose principal goal is to offer Internet access to about four billion people who cannot afford it.
